Expense Tracker

About this project

This is an Expense Tracker App using React hooks and the context API. Users can add transaction information by entering text and amount either in positive or negative. Then the app will show the balance and the history of the transaction. Income transactions will be marked in green and the expenses will be marked in red. You also can find the Vanilla JavaScript version of the same app here. (https://github.com/hazedrops/JS_ExpenseTracker) The transaction data persist in the local storage in this Vanilla JavaScript app.
